settings.title: OFF WHITE x NIKE DUNK LOW 'DEAR SUMMER'
settings.text: The 'Dear Summer' project consists of fifty different Off-White x Dunk Lows, with 48 of them distinctly coloured up with vibrant pops of colour over a neutral base. Each Nike Dunk Low is individually numbered from 1 of 50 to 50 of 50, with signature Virgil Abloh details including a zip-tie, Flywire overlace and lettering on the medial side.

settings.title: AIR JORDAN 1 HIGH
settings.text: The Air Jordan 1 High debuted in 1985 as the first signature sneaker developed by Nike for Michael Jordan. The Peter Moore designed performance basketball sneaker featured a simple Nike Dunk inspired design that incorporated the Nike Swoosh and the Jordan Wings logo and featured Nike Air.

settings.title: Can anyone use your products?
settings.answer: Our products are suitable for all skin types! They’re dermatologist tested, hypoallergenic, sulphate + paraben-free.

settings.title: Will you be adding new products?
settings.answer: Yes! We hope to continue our product line. Check out our site regularly, or sign up for our newsletter to receive updates.

settings.title: Do you test on animals?
settings.answer: We do not! Our products are cruelty-free + vegan.

settings.title: What's your return policy?
settings.answer: All products must be returned in unused condition in their original packaging within 30 days of receiving the order.

settings.title: Do you ship worldwide?
settings.answer: Yes! We are pleased to announce that we now have worldwide shipping. You may experience longer delivery times when shipping to remote areas.

settings.title: Can I exchange my product?
settings.answer: If you want to exchange your product, please reach out to our customer service team to provide further details and set up the return and exchange.

settings.text: We aim to respond to all emails within 24-48hrs.

You can shop online 24/7 but if you need any assistance then our team are available Monday to Sunday, from 11:00 am till 7 pm.
We hope to respond to your enquiry as soon as possible and aim to get back to all enquiries within 48 hours but at busy times this can take longer.
If you require more urgent assistance, wish to place an order, or speak to our customer care team directly you can:

Email: Info@mckickz.club

Instagram: @Mckickzuk

Pop into our store:

81-82 Briggate

Leeds City Centre

LS1 6LH
McKickz uses cookies that identify your device to provide you with a better online shopping experience. To find out more and learn how to opt out, please visit our privacy policy.

McKickz was first established in October 2019. What started of as a hobby of obtaining highly limited sneakers from retailers all across Europe, today is a destination reseller for exclusive and highly coveted sneakers. Securing elusive sneakers can be both challenging and exciting. 

Being at the top of our game by sourcing and increasing our stock from trusted individuals, our competition began to grow. The journey taught us the importance of having the right amount of patience required to excel within this industry. It transformed into more than just a dedication to understand the rich culture and history of sneakers, but to also enhance our industry knowledge and our sourcing skills as well as having to pay more attention to the details of design, material and colourways. 

Kickz have always been a passion of ours and having experienced the rapid growth of the sneaker resell scene, motivated us to build up a strong collection with the ultimate aim of opening a store for exclusive footwear – a paradise for sneaker heads! 

From networking at sneaker events, to having a stall at the most recent Sneaker Con and launching a pop-up store at the beginning of 2020 to raise our own brand awareness, it set us upon a path of realisation of opening our own permanent store in the heart of one of the UK's most vibrant and famous cities- Leeds! A city with action at the heart of it, bursting full of life and cultural energy.

The store as you see it today is a representation of an enormous amounts of energy, time and effort that we have put into our dream. The vision became a reality with the mission of presenting the most current and sought after sneakers through an exclusive store experience, taking the sneaker culture to the next level. 

Here at McKickz, we continously strive to provide a luxurious and exclusive in store experience at the heart of our business.

From Nike, Air Jordan to Supreme, YEEZY, we continuously aim to stock the exclusive and the most elusive sneakers on the market.

Here at McKickz, we love sneakers, and being able to share our knowledge and passion with you only makes our love grow stronger.

Its Not A Lay Lay Ting..®

settings.title: Kickz You Wont Find At Your "Local Retailer"
AIR JORDAN 4
settings.text: The Air Jordan 4, originally released in 1989 was the second Air Jordan designed by Tinker Hatfield. The sneaker sports mesh netting on the tongue and sides as well as plastic wing tabs and once again sporting visible Air in the heel.

settings.title: YEEZY
settings.text: Announced in 2013 and officially released in 2015, the Yeezy collection is the home of cultural icon Kanye West's footwear and apparel designs created in partnership with adidas.

settings.title: NIKE SB DUNKS
settings.text: Nike SB took the 1980s basketball classic the Dunk, and gave it a makeover for skateboarding. Originally debuting in 2003, they have released in high, mid and low-cuts in various colourways and versions.
"Ownership is everything. OWN your mind. Mind your OWN." — Nipsey Hussle
"If At First You Don't Succeed, Then Dust Yourself Off And Try Again." - Aaliyah
"Some people WANT it to happen, some WISH it would happen, others MAKE it happen." – Michael Jordan.

settings.title: NIKE DUNK LOW
settings.text: The Nike Dunk is one of the most iconic sneakers of all time, period. Originally introduced in 1985, the Dunk was the label’s original team-colours shoe, and was released in famous renditions such as the Dunk “Kentucky”, “Michigan”, “Syracuse”, and “Brazil”, releases that remain classics today.
“Dedication, hard work all the time, and belief." CR7

settings.title: Sourcing
settings.text: Can’t find the shoe you want? Don’t worry we can source it for you within 5 working days.

settings.title: 100% Authentic
settings.text: Authenticity is the foundation of our business, and every item we sell is inspected by our expert team.

settings.title: Collection
settings.text: Can't wait till the next day? Order online and utilise our same day pick up in-store!
